venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Restaurant

item.description: Trivia is held at Chuck's steak house on Thursdays. An emcee reads the question, and the team, comprised of approximately six people, submits an answer, bidding a certain number of points each time. The team with the most points wins.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a small meetup sign. I will give out my cell number closer to the event
item.name: Trivia at Chuck's
